text: George Ryden (born 14 July 1940) is a Scottish footballer, who played for Dundee, St Johnstone and Stirling Albion. Ryden played for Dundee in the 1964 Scottish Cup Final, which they lost 3–1 to Rangers. ==External links== * Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football central defenders Category:Dundee F.C. players Category:St Johnstone F.C. players Category:Stirling Albion F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Sportspeople from Dumbarton Category:Duntocher Hibernian F.C. players
title: George Ryden
